Description:
Eco-friendly property tailored for family living
If you desire a sustainable lifestyle without being totally off the grid, this could be your ideal property.
The brick veneer country-style home built in 2014 on approximately 83,613m² (20 acres) lies in a serene location beside the pretty tree-lined Axe Creek.
The cosy dwelling is ideal for the larger family with amazing space including a big living room inside the entry with gas and solid fuel heating with heat transfer, a versatile room for formal lounge/dining/media or study plus spacious open-plan, kitchen/meals and family living zones.
The kitchen features an island bench for food prepping, casual dining or homework while a large walk-in pantry, stainless steel 900mm gas/electric range and dishwasher. Alongside the kitchen, the family living area opens to the covered alfresco area and pool.
The main bedroom at the front includes walk-in-robe and ensuite with three more good-sized robed bedrooms, family bathroom, laundry and WC in a separate wing beyond the kitchen area.
The alfresco pavilion is ideal for entertaining or relaxing while the kids splash about in the 11m electric- heated pool.
The cleared land divided into four paddocks includes an orchard with a variety of fruit trees and plenty of room for a veggie garden, chook run etc.
Other enhancements include 5.2Kw solar power with battery back-up, an 18m x 7m Colorbond shed/workshop and attached double carport, 160K ltr. rainwater storage and good fencing.
If you are seeking an enviable lifestyle in a quiet location with the bubbling Axe Creek as your side boundary, then there is nothing to do but call for a private inspection.
The fabulous property situated off O'Briens Lane is close to Mount Sugarloaf Nature Conservation Reserve for bushwalking & bike trails and only a 17-minute drive to Bendigo and 13 minutes to Lake Eppalock.
Insights: 11 Northwood Court, Axedale VIC 3551 was last sold in 2012 and 4 other 4 bedroom house in Axedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Home or Proven Long Term Investment
Nestled in the established Acacia Park Estate is this 4-bedroom family home, minutes away from the Epsom Village Plaza & train station.
- All great sized bedrooms. Master with walk-in robe, ensuite, and ceiling fan. Other three bedrooms with built-in robes.
- Open study or sitting area
- Open plan kitchen and meals. Kitchen with gas hotplates, under bench oven, dishwasher, walk-in pantry, and island bench
- Separated lounge area
- Main bathroom with shower, separate bath, and vanity
- Ducted gas heating, reverse cycle cooling
- Good sized backyard with scope and room for shed
- Block size 663m2 (approx.)
Ideal family home, first home or investment opportunity with a proven long term rental return with a fantastic tenant.
Private inspections by appointment.

Description:
Resort Style Living on a Spacious 1142m2 Allotment
Its time to bring the holiday to your backyard and spoil yourself with the opportunity to call this amazing residence your home. Built by a quality builder and set on a large family friendly allotment, this property is immaculately presented and youll be instantly impressed upon inspection.
Adaptable floorplan comprises 3 bedrooms plus large study (or 4th bedroom) with main including ensuite with corner spa and walk in robe, large open plan kitchen/meals and living, plus separate formal lounge.
Undercover Alfresco area overlooks your own private paradise complete with solar heated inground pool with adjoining retreat area, nestled amongst stunning landscaped gardens in a secure environment.
Providing further flexibility is the spacious studio/multi-purpose room which is insulated and equipped with split system heating/cooling to suit a wide variety of needs, including accommodation as a guest bedroom or teenagers retreat.
Further attributes include 6m x 3m workshop with roller door, concrete floor and power. Vehicle access to the yard with space for caravan, trailer or boat. Energy costs will be reduced with the 3 kilowatt solar system.
Offering a scenic environment in the highly regarded suburb of Maiden Gully, this property provides you easy access to local supermarket, specialty shops, primary school, new Marist College, and recreational facilities. For everything else central Bendigo has to offer, a 10 min drive will have you in the heart of the city.
Insights: 42 Glenelg Drive, Maiden Gully VIC 3551 was last sold in 2004 and 45 other 4 bedroom house in Maiden Gully have recently been sold.

Description:
Russell Parsons built, Fully Renovated 2 Bedroom Townhouse
What an absolute pleasure it is to present this single level Russell Parsons built townhouse in a street that is surrounded with so many beautiful and executive style homes.
This immaculately presented 2-bedroom townhouse has had an impressive and extraordinary make over.
The update and renovations include a brand-new kitchen with all new fixtures, fittings and appliances.
New floor coverings, gleaming white window shutters and paintwork everywhere. The open plan kitchen/meals, lounge room is ever-so roomy, as are both the bedrooms (with ceiling fans in each), the main bedroom offering a walk-in robe and its own separate access to the fully-renovated and updated bathroom.
Split-system unit as well as a gas wall furnace for heating and cooling.
Outside are beautiful gardens with low maintenance yards, alfresco, rainwater tank, solar panels, plus a single garage to accommodate your vehicle securely, as well as a secondary car space in the drive. Minutes to everything that Spring Gully has to offer with schools, La Trobe University, medical facilities, walking tracks and Bendigo Central all within 5 minutes away.
Insights: 1/26 Annabell Court, Spring Gully VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 2 bedroom house in Spring Gully have recently been sold.

Address: Land at Millers Flat Road Whipstick VIC 3556
Description:
Zoned Farming - 8.564ha Property with Creek Line Scenery and 3.2meg Water Right
What an amazing lush setting this 8.564ha (approx. 21ac) parcel of land presents, in Millers Flat Road out at the Whipstick.
Obtain and apply for a planning permit (STCA) and create your home away from home.
Privacy is assured with a picturesque creek line running through the middle of the block with mature gums and regrowth grey box complimenting the scenery.
Zoned farming, the allotment has a small dam in the western corner plus a bonus of a 3.2 megalitre water right via a private channel from Coliban Water Authority.
Soils are ready for you to set up and start a horticulture interest to occupy your lazy weekends and lifestyle.
Just a short 10 minute drive to both popular Epsom and Eaglehawk shops and schools, and all the amenities these two northern suburbs have to offer.
Directions:
From Leans Rd, Huntly (off Midland Hwy), the distance to the block is approx 6.5km.
Off Leans Rd, turn right into Wallenjoe Rd, then left into Wards Rd, then turn into Millers Flat Rd.
The block sits next to 154 Millers Flat Rd.

Description:
Modern Townhouse In Quiet Location
Wonderfully private and on it's own title, is this lovely spacious two bedroom brick veneer townhouse. Ideal for those wanting to downsize with minimal maintenance.
All bedrooms are of good proportions with walk in robe to main & built in robe to second bedroom. Lovely tiled open plan kitchen/dining and living that are north facing and enhanced by natural light accentuating the generous living space. The kitchen boasts over head cupboards, pantry and new gas hot plates and electric oven.
Other features include a three piece dual bathroom. Laundry with bench space and linen press, split system heating and cooling, direct entry to home via lock up garage and a low maintenance compact courtyard.
Easy living and only a short distance to shops, schools, bus and local amenities.
This property is a must to inspection.

Description:
Character filled two bedroom home in great location on large block with an approved Planning Permit
Phone enquiry code for this property: 1731
This delightful and welcoming cottage house is situated in a quiet pocket of California Gully. Less than 1 minute walk to the California Gully Oval and playground, a short walk to either the St Liborious or Eaglehawk Primary Schools and around the corner from Eaglehawk High School!
Features include polished floor boards throughout, 2 spacious bedrooms, ducted air conditioning, lounge with gas heater, kitchen/dining with gas oven, bathroom with separate bath and shower, separate laundry and toilet, multipurpose space for use as perhaps a study, sitting area or play area. It boasts a fabulous large west facing front veranda and a spacious rear yard.
The property has an approved Planning Permit for a 2 Lot subdivision. Options exist to subdivide and sell the rear land, sell the house and build on the land or renovate and expand the existing house. Alternatively, keep as is and enjoy the space of the large rear yard! Opportunities abound, now and into the future.
Currently tenanted at $255 per week with lease expiring on 17th February 2021.
Phone enquiry code for this property: 1731

Description:
A 1970's Showpiece in Highly Sought-After Location!
Positioned on an elevated allotment within the McIvor Hill Precinct is this special home which was built and lived in by the same family for 45 years.
Oozing with typical 1970s character such as stramit ceilings, handcrafted timber beams, timber panelling throughout and internal brickwork, this original gem will appeal to all feature lovers.
The property has a parents wing with master bedroom with built in robes and ensuite. Formal Lounge adjoins formal dining area with built in cabinetry and views to the backyard and reserve. Walk through to open plan updated kitchen/meals and living area. Ample storage throughout hallway which leads to Laundry with walk through WC and family bathroom. Bedrooms three & four are separated by built in desk & cabinetry, in addition to built in robes, Bedroom two is generous in size with built in robes.
Outside you will find a concreted patio which overlooks the established gardens and crown land reserve as well as a separate drying/storage room plus shedding which backs onto the carport for two cars.
Location is key being adjacent to the prestigious Doak Street, 5 minutes to Lake Weeroona, Kennington Reservoir, Strath Village Shopping Centre and Bendigo CBD.
This original beauty would suit a family seeking space and tranquillity or a renovator to modernise whilst capitalising on the size of the land, 1300m2+ and location.
Additional Features;
- Garden sprinkler system
- Ducted Gas Heating
- Evaporative Cooling

Address: Lot 11 Hargreaves Road Emu Creek VIC 3551
Description:
11 ACRES WITH ISOLATION STUDIO POSITIONED FOR NATURE LOVERS! 15 MINUTES FROM BENDIGO
With undulating access from James Cook Drive, Lot 11 Hargreaves Road offers a superb private getaway just 15 minutes to Bendigo and 6 minutes to Strathfieldsaye. The beautifully treed block is situated 1km up the road from the expansive Greater Bendigo National Park and 4km from the Sedgwick State Forest. Perfect for twitchers, trail walking and riding or just enjoying the great Aussie outdoors. Measuring approx. 500 metres long by approx. 100 metres frontage with 2 dams and an entry track to the cabin, the foundations have already been laid for a perfect weekender in the bush . It is Zoned Rural Living. The single room cabin is a timber framed mud brick construction and features a paved sandstone floor over a concrete base, high gable ceiling, mezzanine sleep over level, verandah on the north and west side, steel rain water tank, timber lined ceiling, windows, plus an outdoors fire pit for the cool evenings.
Close to Strathfieldaye shops, schools and services this property has the native garden already in place and no neighbours in view. The perfect place to recharge the batteries.
Please note that you will need 4wd assistance to drive from Hargreaves Rd to the propertys front gate.

Description:
Modern Townhouse Living in Flora Hill
Modern townhouse living in central Flora Hill, 86A Somerville Street is an enticing property package.
Set on a corner block, the Paul Gray built home offers a stylish front facade and all your mod cons to ensure true ease of living.
Imagine living central to Bendigo's most popular attractions, schools, shops, amenities and public transport; just 2.5km to Bendigo Marketplace and the train station in one direction, less than 2km to Strath Village Shopping Centre, or head to Kangaroo Flat in a matter of minutes.
Stepping inside, your first two bedrooms at the front of the home offer built-in robes and plenty of natural light, and are serviced by the home's main modern bathroom offering a bath, shower and vanity.
The light-filled open-plan kitchen, meals and living offers all the contemporary essentials; stylish cabinetry, stainless-steel appliances and feature island bench with sink, overlooking the rest of the living space.
The master is set at the back of the home and offers wall-to-wall built-in robes and a stylish three-piece ensuite.
Easily control the climate through all seasons with ducted heating and cooling.
Outside, enjoy secure off-street parking with your double lock-up garage, and entertain guests under your cosy undercover alfresco area.
Add to the investment portfolio, bring in a rental income or occupy for yourself as a first-home buyer.
Contact Bendigo Real Estate to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
8.3 Acre Lifestyle Allotment in Prime Strathfieldsaye Position
Extremely rare opportunity to secure yourself such a large lifestyle block on the edge of suburban Strathfieldsaye.
8.3 Acres in size with natural bush surrounds and a 750m2 designated building envelope.
Power is available and town water is also within close proximity further details can be provided upon request.
Zoned Low Density Residential ready for you to design and construct your dream home.
Strathfieldsaye is renowned as a very popular suburb with highly regarded primary schools, childcare facilities and strong local sporting clubs and facilities. This outstanding allotment is situated within a short drive to various conveniences and amenities locally, and only 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD. Inspect the property at your leisure.
Directions: Follow Guys Hill Road (towards Tannery Lane) and turn right into Ryalls Lane. The allotment is situated on the right hand side of the road.

Description:
SOLID HOME WITH EN SUITE AND 6M X 6M SHED
It really does tick plenty of boxes, it is slightly elevated, it is in excellent order throughout, it is on a spacious allotment and boasts good living space, there's a large shed/workshop and an en suite to the main bedroom - and an affordable price bracket.
The living space which includes a spacious L-shape lounge and dining with wall-mount air conditioner and a separate family room adjacent to the kitchen which also boasts sliding door leading to the alfresco outside.
The kitchen is in original but superb order with plenty of cabinetry, 600mm upright cooker, overhead cupboards and a dishwasher.
The master bedroom boasts a walk-in-robe and a three-piece en-suite,l, there are robes to bedrooms two and three, there's ducted gas heating and good storage throughout the home.
The family bathroom is spacious and boasts a separate bath, shower and vanity basin with storage and the laundry has room for a dryer.
Outside is a large covered alfresco space with stencilled concrete, a private back yard with Colorbond fencing and a 6m x 6m powered garage/workshop. There's also a single carport with remote roller out front. This home is in a lovely quiet street, close to transport and schools and is as solid as any home of its era.
It is very worthy of an inspection.

Description:
Welcome Home
This low maintenance home would make a great family home or a fantastic addition to any investment portfolio. The home was completed in early 2016. First home buyers may be able to capitalise on the $20,000 First Home Owners Grant plus reduced stamp duty
Located on a corner allotment with access and gates to the rear yard this home offers options. With three good sized bedrooms all with BIR, master with built in robes and ensuite and a separate office the home feels spacious. The light-filled open-plan kitchen/meals/lounge area overlooks the securely fenced and landscaped backyard with garden shed and multiple outdoor areas. Outside offers carefree living, with a low-maintenance yard and direct access to the double garage and room for further shedding or trailer storage.
The home is within walking distance to parks, daycare centre, parks and walking tracks. With the added convenience of being within minutes of Bendigo CBD, schools, sporting facilities and Neangar Park Golf Course.
Inside Features:
3 Spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes
Master bedroom with built in robes and ensuite
Separate office/Fourth bedroom
Open plan lounge
Large dining room
Ducted gas heating
Ducted evaporative cooling
Light and airy kitchen/lounge
Outside Features:
Fully fenced rear yard
Complete Landscaping with garden shed
Side access to rear yard
Low maintenance block
If a low maintenance good quality home is what you are looking for then this is worth viewing.

Description:
Fresh-as-a-daisy family home
Like the street name, this fresh-as-a-daisy home exudes a spring-fresh, airy atmosphere.
Set an elevated lot approx 639m², the one-owner home is barely run-in at only five-years-old but has all the hard work and trimmings already completed.
Presented in excellent condition with high ceilings and a tall front door adding an extra spacious feel the moment you enter the tiled hallway.
The residence consists of four bedrooms, two chic bathrooms, separate lounge/theatre/rumpus and expansive open-plan kitchen, dining and living areas seamlessly flow through sliding doors to side and rear alfresco areas.
The galley-style kitchen includes a stainless steel 900mm gas/electric range, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and ample cabinetry including an island bench for food prepping, casual dining or homework.
The main bedroom with walk-through robe and ensuite is situated tucked away at the back with the remaining bedrooms and family bathroom grouped close together.
Extra features include ducted heating and cooling, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, neutral décor, double garage with remote door and internal access, added off-street parking and double-gated side access to the secure backyard.
Easy-care landscaping includes a terraced back yard, exposed aggregate paving and established trees around the perimeter.
Located in a community-minded and friendly new-home area the property is one door from a treed reserve and walking path leading to the tranquil park and the Waratah Road bus stop with the popular Viewpoint Playground a 10-minute walk.
Insights: First listed on 30 September, this house has been on Domain for 20 days. It was last sold in 2014 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Huntly have recently been sold.

Address: 2 - 221 Mandurang South Road Mandurang South VIC 3551
Description:
QUALITY BUILT CONTEMPORARY HOME SET AMIDST BEAUTIFUL PARK-LIKE SURROUNDINGS
Brilliantly presented, this picture perfect 8.7 acre lifestyle property has all that you could want and more featuring a sensational craftsman built home set in glorious park-like surroundings, ideally situated only 12 minutes from Bendigo's CBD in one of our most highly regarded precincts.
A meandering driveway leading up to the homes gently elevated position allows you a moment to appreciate the very high standard of landscaping and immaculate presentation even before you arrive at this stunning contemporary residence which blends in beautifully with its picturesque natural surroundings.
A wonderful crazy paved sandstone path guides you to the gracious portico which invites you to enter upon the tiled foyer where the impeccable finish that you will find throughout becomes apparent with a delicate chandelier and glass panelled doors to greet you and your guests.
Built by renowned Bendigo firm McCathy Homes with a north facing solar passive design and offering almost twenty seven squares of living, this impressive home has many outstanding features to set it apart, amongst which are wall niches to display your most interesting pieces of art, 9' ceilings for a spacious feel and suspended ceilings in the kitchen and dining area for that extra touch of class and lighting effect.
The highly functional floorplan incorporates a formal lounge with large picture windows separate to the expansive open plan kitchen, dining, living area. Even the most discerning chef would delight in this enviably appointed kitchen equipped with Bosch stainless steel appliances, a pyrolytic oven, ceramic induction cooktop, Fisher Paykel fridge, island bench, ample storage and bench space and a huge walk-in butler's pantry, not to mention the idyllic outlook over backyard and gardens.
The four bedrooms all have quality carpets and windows furnishings, the main with a ceiling fan and ensuite with his-and-hers basins, an oversized shower, separate toilet and large walk-in-robe with plenty of shelving. The other three bedrooms are all queen sized with built-in-robes, they are serviced by a three piece bathroom with a deep tub and separate powder room style toilet. All of the bedrooms have a lovely treed outlook.
Whoever normally takes care of the families wash will love the huge laundry with loads of bench top work space, under bench washer & dryer hutch and the massive walk-in-linen press behind the sliding door. Another boon is the large storage room in hallway, solar hot water, zoned instant ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling.
You can simply enjoy the private setting or entertain family and friends alfresco style on the large verandah with direct access through sliding doors from the living area and one of the bedrooms. Backing onto a national park almost guarantees a breathtaking backdrop alive with abundant wildlife and birdlife. An approximately 2 acre fenced house yard is perfect for kids and pets and has rabbit proof fencing. There is also a smaller holding yard at the rear of the home.
The garden is low maintenance with a vast array of drought tolerant plants, granite boulder retaining walls, plenty of taps, raised veggie beds and a hothouse. An ample water supply is provided by two rain water tanks; a 22,500 litre poly tank on the shed and a massive 263,000 litre tank on the house with a combined total storage of 285,500 litres together with a large catchment dam with contours in place to ensure all the water that falls from the sky is captured.
Excellent shedding and vehicle storage includes a double lockup garage complete with a remote panel lift door and access directly into the home. A large 14.5 x 7.6m, 4 bay workshop is well equipped and suitable for a tradesperson with a concrete floor, lights and power, great storage shelving and loads of bench space.
The location is extremely handy and you will love your daily drive providing a few minutes to unwind as you travel to and from work in Bendigo which really is just a stone's throw away. For those who like to frequent Melbourne or the Tullamarine airport, it's a very easy commute in around 90 minutes and you get to travel a very scenic route through Sutton Grange.
Call today to arrange an inspection of this irresistible lifestyle property.
Please Note; Private inspection for qualified buyers only with 24 hours minimum notice.

Description:
Affordable weekend block situated only 200m from river reserve & waterfront
Quarter acre allotment very close to the Loddon river. An opportunity to secure this perfect weekend block that's approximately 200 metres to the river reserve and the waterfront access. Situated in the riverside village of Newbridge that boasts a general store/post office that caters to all needs and the iconic Newbridge Hotel.
Peace and tranquility is assured here with access to fishing and meandering walking tracks. The block is zoned "Farming Zone" but for a weekend getaway you could bring your tiny house or caravan. Services available are electricity and phone. There is no town water or town sewerage. The block is actually accessed from Parker Street, there is no road, it is a grassed road reserve access. The block is adorned by a very old and quite large peppercorn tree that sits on road reserve boundary side. A level allotment in a quiet location, just waiting for you.
